metadata.title: CVE-2020-9355 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: danfruehauf NetworkManager-ssh before 1.2.11 allows privilege escalationbecause extra options are mishandled.

criterions.comment: network-manager-ssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
